mapper.select: SELECT f.id, f.function_name, f.function_key FROM sys_function f JOIN sys_role_function rf ON rf.function_id = f.id WHERE rf.role_id = #{roleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO sys_role_function(role_id, function_id) VALUES (#{roleId}, #{functionId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sys_role_function WHERE role_id = #{roleId} AND function_id = #{functionId}
